text: Patients were treated with a combination of EBRT and intracavitary brachytherapy.Concurrent chemotherapy consisted of cisplatin.The 5-year OS were $4 0 \%$ for patients who underwent concurrent chemotherapy and extended field radiotherapy as compared to $1 8 \%$ for patients who had extended field radiotherapy alone, with median survival of 29 months and 13 months, respectively.
